name: Hide and Seek (itch) (Tengku Hana Shafikah)
description:
You are in a small art gallery and spotted a painting that had a mysterious parallax effect. It turns out that inside the painting is a physical room with an entity living inside, asking you to play a game of hide and seek. Would you play along?

This short prototype was quickly put together for a weekly game dev class assignment (Prompt #6: Portrait).  Created by Tengku Hana Shafikah. Made in Unreal Engine.

*Quick Note: If you're wondering why you can't win after multiple attempts, perhaps the entity itself is cheating and a good ending an never be achieved. 😉
